      • fillALine

        public void fillALine(int lineIndex,
                      Grid grid)
        Row Filler Tester This method fills a line using Die
        Parameters:
        lineIndex - is the line of the grid (param grid) to be filled by Die with different colors
        grid - is the grid to be considered to fill the its line.

      • testDifferentColorRow

        public void testDifferentColorRow()
        DifferentColorRow Tester this test checks if the calculation of the score is correct filling a row of a grid with Die with different colors starting with the first to the last. For each filling of the row it assert that the expected score is equal to the effective score calculating by the publicScore method

      • testDifferentColorRowSame

        public void testDifferentColorRowSame()
        DifferentColorRowSame Tester Before the start of this test the grid that is the used is empty Die. this test checks if the calculation of the score is correct filling a row of a grid with Die with different colors starting with the first to the last. For each filling of the row it assert that the expected score is equal to the effective score calculating by the publicScore method

      • testGetCardNumber

        public void testGetCardNumber()
        GetCardNumber Tester This method tests that is returned the correct card number
